,xenoFLASH,2012-03-21T09:06Z,THANK YOU! you rock
,jesterdog66,2012-03-21T14:03Z,Why the introduction of the magnet link? I can't download the whole 3+ gb just for a few mb of comics. How do I get just the comics I want? 
[V],LeonardTSpock,2012-03-22T02:41Z,@jesterdog66 If you use uTorrent you will need to have it set up so you can see the files downloading in the lower panel. There's an up arrow in the lower right corner of uTorrent that will bring up this panel if you don't normally use it.

column1: Click on the magnet link to bring up the box that starts the download (the one where you used to be able to choose which files you wanted to download) and click OK, so the torrent starts doing it's think in uTorrent.

Go to uTorrent and click on the torrent - it should highlight the line in blue. Wait until the torrent starts downloading. When it does, if you have left the torrent highlighted, all of the files will appear in the lower panel. It takes a bit more time for magnet links to start, so depending on your connection speed the files might show up in 30 seconds of 3 minutes.

Once the files have shown up you can then go through and right click them, choosing ""Don't Download"" for any files that you don't want. If you hold down the Control key you can select multiple individual files to ""skip"". If you hold down the Shift key you can select entire sections to ""skip"".

It takes about a minute, maybe a little more or a little less, for me to go through and ""skip"" all the books I don't read (which is at least 75% of them). During that time you may end up getting a couple books downloaded to your hard drive that you'll have to delete.
It's a bit of a hassle, but it works just fine.
Negatives: If you seed at all, you won't be seeding the entire download.  But if you normally unchecked books the way you used to download it makes no difference.

Unfortunately, I believe it uTorrent or the magnet link process still puts a placeholder equal to the size of the entire download on your hard drive. However, you WILL ONLY DOWNLOAD THE BOOKS YOU DON'T CHOOSE TO ""SKIP"".

For instance, this weeks download is 3.56 GB, but if you only choose to download 160 MB of books, after they've downloaded and you've removed the torrent file from uTorrent, that will be all the space they take up on your hard drive.
Also, if it's a speed issue, don't worry. Once you've right clicked and selected ""Don't Download"" you will only download the books you want, so it should take no longer than it took in the past."
[V],LeonardTSpock,2012-03-22T02:42Z,And thanks shipJ. I seriously look forward to this torrent. It's a real highlight of my week.
